text: This ranking includes the clubs with players in the team when their national teams won the FIFA World Cup. The UEFA site does not list the 13 world champions of São Paulo and other players. == By club == Club Country No. Champions players Juventus 27 Bayern München 24 Inter Milan 20 Roma 16 Peñarol 14
